scripts.version:bump: pnpm -r version $(cenv -v -s) && git add package.json packages/api/package.json packages/spa/package.json pnpm-lock.yaml && git commit -m "push bump packages" && git push && pnpm version prerelease && git push
scripts.publish:bump: pnpm run version:bump && pnpm --filter "@stoked-cenv/*" run publish:bump --publish-branch $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
